name: RetroWave
description: RetroWave is an oscilloscope-themed robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box and laser screen, it stands out from the crowd. Its soldier-like arms and legs give it a sturdy and reliable appearance. RetroWave combines the nostalgia of retro consoles with the futuristic technology of lasers, making it a fascinating and unique member of the club.
